definition: to spit blood (idiom); venomous slander/malicious attacks
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(of a smell) strong/peak season (of a crop)/(classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)

sentences.english: Don't offend her. She always smites with the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 萬萬別獲咎她，她經常血口噴人。
